summary: This is an FBI administrative form documenting the enclosure of an IRS forensic account analysis related to bank accounts belonging to SOUTHERN TRUST and SOUTHERN COUNTRY INTERNATIONAL, with a case synopsis mentioning wire fraud.

events.title: FBI Form Creation for IRS Forensic Analysis
events.description: An FBI form was created to document the enclosure of an IRS forensic account analysis of bank accounts belonging to SOUTHERN TRUST and SOUTHERN COUNTRY INTERNATIONAL, with a synopsis citing wire fraud.

keyFacts: The IRS contracted forensic accountants to conduct reviews of bank accounts belonging to SOUTHERN TRUST and SOUTHERN COUNTRY INTERNATIONAL.
The case synopsis mentions 'Wire Fraud' in connection with these accounts.
The document is an FBI administrative form dated April 26, 2021, used to record the enclosure of the IRS analysis.
